title: Same toxic player 3 times in a row...
body:
What do you do when you get the same toxic player 3 games in a row in ranked? This player called <removed> has just gone out of his way to make the game miserable for my teams over the last 3 games. Each time, he's been reported. Ends up in the same queue again, and then it all begins again. Muting stops the abuse and harassment, but it doesn't stop the active sabotage of every teamfight and play. 

(Edit: Removed name)

What can a player do to avoid/overcome this problem?

replies.body:
First off, you can't name and shame on the boards so you'll want to get rid of that name there.

Look, the easiest way to _not_ get the same person is to _not_ queue again. The punishment system usually isn't instant so hoping he got banned within 3 minutes probably won't happen. Wait 5-10 minutes and you should get a fresh batch of players. If you're feeling particularly paranoid you can use http://oce.op.gg/ to track a player and wait for them to be in a game before you queue.

I'll remove krazith out of the OP didn't realise. But in response to your post, not queuing up again ends up punishing the player/victim. In two cases I waited about 5 minutes in the hope that he'd be in some other game by then.

You kinda just posted his name again. 

Look it's not ideal that you have to wait but it's not a punishment either. Would you rather wait or get the same person? The choice is up to you.

i use lolnexus
i had a smuirf duo that wer ejust owning my entire team. im assuming smurf because they were way too good for bronze

I used lolnexus, when it said they were in game then i queued
Report/block and they will be dealt with.

yeah like what Nijiyo said, cant name and shame.
It does suck but there is a reason for it.

Just wait write a detailed report of the guy who was toxic, have a breather.
Go eat some delicious cookies or something.

This way when you get back you a fresh and happy to go back into ranked.
You will be happier, less tilted and thus less likely to have another bad game.
